Text:
oh, bless you.  I've been stalking the pirate bay, waiting for someone to upload.  Can you believe that it's been more than 20 years since the first one came out?  I hope this one's amazing!

Thanks again :)

WARNING!
I haven't listened to this yet but in itunes this folder adds up to about 8hours, which would make this either an abridged version or an incomplete rip. According to wikipedia the book is about 42 hours.

This is not the entire book! 
Just listened to the last file. Apparently this is only part 1 of X.

Sorry, i guess i fucked up the breaking up of the massive chapters....they were about 6 lots of 8 hour recordings when i got from audible. i didn't test properly. will fix up tomorrow and re-upload.

apologies
Thanks for the effort. I'll hit the new torrent when you get it on here.  Ignore the the bullshit, and keep on truckin'.
Dont listen to the bitchers. Thanks for the work and I look forward to checking back tomorrow to download!

Thanks for the first part, looking forward to the rest.
Ignore bob9001a. He's an asshat and every comment he has ever made is negative with foul language. Plus he's just a leech.

Good job!
